about_the_game:
In this limited demo of Whispers in the Wood, survive for up to 7 in-game days while managing your base and defending against nightmarish creatures. This version offers a glimpse into the game's core mechanics but with certain restrictions compared to the full release.

What’s Included in the Demo:

  • Survival for 7 Days: Experience the intense survival loop for a total of 7 days. The full version allows survival for up to 30 days.

  • Limited Enemies: Face a small selection of enemy types. The full game will feature a much larger variety of foes with diverse abilities.

  • Restricted Unit Deployment: You can build one scientist, but soldiers cannot be recruited in the demo.

  • Building and Research Caps: Building upgrades and research are limited to early levels, focusing on basic survival and defense. The full version includes a wider variety of buildings to unlock and upgrade.

  • Resource Limits: The demo includes essential resources for survival. The full version introduces iron and other materials for advanced construction and upgrades.

  • Day Exploration & Night Defense: Gather resources during the day and defend your base against demonic creatures at night. Each night brings stronger enemies and new challenges.

The demo provides a brief but intense introduction to the world of Whispers in the Wood. The full version expands the experience with more enemies, units, buildings, resources, and days to survive.

Can you survive the 7-day demo, or will you endure the full 30-day challenge in the complete game?

short_description: Whispers in the Forest is a single-player base defense strategy game where you must build, upgrade, and defend your base against demonic creatures in a cursed forest. Manage your resources, lead your troops, and survive the darkness of the night as you fight to protect your only hope for salvation.
